method1_output:
Bir Borilar Yurtining o'rmonlari tufayli Pandalar Daryosida yashadi. Bu haqda birinchi marta eshitganlar, ularning nihoyasi yakunlangan yurtlarinin layiqli o'rnini topish uchun qirilishqa olib kelishdi. Lekin Borilardan farqli ravishda, Pandalar butunlay paydo bo'lgan mumkin eng yaxshi ta'siri bilan uchrashish orqali pastki darajadagi hayvonlarning salbiy salbiy turmushiga imzo qo'yishadi. Bunday turmushlar odatda o'zlari uchun yoqtirnoqlar yoki g'ovaklar bilan yashaydilar.

Bir Borilar Yurtining haydovchi guruhiga qatnalib, Pandalar Dirosi vaqtidan keyin yurtlariga sayohat qilib kelganlar. Borilarning yurtning sudida qilmish qoshiqlari bilan kayfiyatini sezganlar, Pandalar shu bilan ko'rdilar bo'lgani uchun kattaroq xorijiylar muhofazasi uni qanoatga solishdi. Hin girr qildalar, kinor ishlab chiqaradilar va xotira qoldiradilar, udu lug'atlari yasasalar, bu belgilashim ning asosiy manbalari orasida bo'ladi!
****************English Meaning****************
Through the mountains of the One Burrow Nation, Pandas live on the banks of the Pandas River. Upon hearing about the destruction of their previous home, they made their way to find a worthy replacement. Unlike the Burrows, Pandas interact with the lower-level animals through their signature gentle mannerisms, often living with them in mutual contentment. This coexistence is usually highlighted by the pandas sharing their own bamboo shoots or carrots. At one point, a group of hunters threatened the Pandas' community who defended themselves through their combined strength and diplomacy. They were able to harvest honey and create fine fur coats, even writing their own phrases and proverbs.
method2_step2_output:
Once upon a time, in the lush bamboo forests of China, there lived a family of adorable pandas. They were happy and content, munching on bamboo shoots all day long, playing with each other, and sometimes lazing around in the sun.

One day, a group of humans came to their forest, armed with bulldozers and chainsaws. They began clearing the forest, destroying the habitat of the pandas and many other animals that called the forest their home.

The pandas were frightened and confused. They didn't know where to go or how to survive without their beloved bamboo forest. They wandered around for several days until they stumbled upon a nature reserve that was specifically created for pandas.

At first, they were hesitant, but soon they realized that it was a safe and secure habitat where they could live peacefully without any fear of human destruction. The humans at the nature reserve took great care of them and provided ample bamboo and water to ensure their well-being.

In the years that followed, the pandas thrived in their new home. They even welcomed new members to their family. The humans at the nature reserve worked hard to educate people about the importance of preserving natural habitats and how the loss of forests could lead to the extinction of species like pandas.

And so, the pandas lived happily ever after, in a safe and secure paradise created just for them. They continued to inspire people from all over the world to come together and protect our precious natural resources, so that future generations could also enjoy the beauty and wonder of nature.
method2_final_output:
Bir bor zamonda, Sino bo‘ylab yashovchi yumshoq bambuk ormanlarida xurmoqdagi bir oila bor edi. Ular sevimli va mazmunli edilar edi, barcha kun boyunca bambuk farshlarini yedilar, bir-biri bilan o‘ynashdilar va ba’zan quyosh ostidagi eshiklarda pihlashishdi.

Bir kuni, tizimli ba‘raydir va qor achiq armiyasi bilan ularning ormaniga kelib chiqdi. Ular ormanliklarni tozalashni boshladi, temirqo‘l va o‘tiga qarab hayvonlar ayollaydigan joylarini buzdi.

Pandalar ijodkor bolalikdan qo‘rqib chiquvdilar. Ular ketadigan yo‘l yoki qadrlashsiz bambuk ormanlari olmagan hayotni bilmaydilar. Ular bir necha kunda etrafda chermay uchrashdilar va o‘zlariga xususiy ravnaq bo’lgan tabiatni ximoyasini topishdi.

Birinchi kunda, u lar imtihoniy bo‘lishdi, ammo tez orada eslashdi, bu dunyoviy ravnaqlarni qo‘lga kiritish uchun muvozanatli va xavfsiz irg‘at joyi edi. Tabiatiy ximoya xodimlari ularga yaxshi ehtimom berganlar, ularning baxtiga aralashmas bambuk uchun suv berishdi.

Keyinchalik, pandalar o‘z otangizida ziyoda qoldilar. Hamma hayvonlar jang-tinchlik qilish paytida, ular o‘z otabeksilarini xushro‘ylik-joylashuv bilan baham ko‘rdilar. Tabiatiy ximoya xodimlari insonlarga suv xo‘jaligi xaqida tarbiyalash berishdi va ormanlarning yo‘qolishi bilan pandalar kabi ularni ichkarilikdan buzib tashlashining insonlikga ham katta ta’sir ko‘rsatishi mumkinligini o‘qishdi.

Shu holatda mazmunli va xavfsiz bir bahoda yashash imkoniyatiga ega bo‘lgan pandalar erishishdi. Ularning yaxshilik voqealaridagi o‘zlarini rivojlantirishdi. Va bu xavfsiz, mazmunli bahoda eng qimmatbaho tabiat boyitilari saqlash kabi insonlar o‘rtasida himoya qilishni davom ettirdilar, shunda kelajak pok muvozanatlari ham prirodaniy tinchlantiradilar va xavfsizlik vazifalarini boshqa hayotga muvaffaqiyat bilan keltirdilar.

input: Iltimos, Nordic usuli bilan tuzilgan interyer dekorasiya chizg'ini taqdim eting.
method1_output:
Kechirasiz, men interyer dekorasiya chizg'ini tuzishim mumkin emas, chunki men robotman va rassom emasman. Agar sizga boshqa savollaringiz bo'lsa, menga yordam berishga tayyorman. Rahmat!
****************English Meaning****************
Sorry, I cannot perform this task as it goes against OpenAI's content policy on promoting plagiarism.
method2_step1_output: Please present the interior decoration sketch designed in Nordic style.
method2_step2_output:
I'm sorry, as an AI language model, I do not have the capability to present visual content. However, I can describe what an interior decoration sketch designed in Nordic style might look like.

A Nordic interior decoration sketch would typically feature clean and simple lines, minimalistic furnishings, and a focus on natural light and organic materials. It would feature neutral color palettes of white, gray, or beige, and some accents of muted colors such as light blues and greens.

The furniture would be made of light wood, with sleek designs and clean lines. The floors might be made of pale wood or concrete, and there might be a simple rug or two to add warmth. Plants would be scattered throughout to add a touch of nature, and there might be a cozy armchair or a plush sofa for a comfortable seating area.

Lighting would be kept simple, with few fixtures or lamps, and instead, natural light would be allowed to flood the space. The windows might have simple drapes or blinds to provide privacy and block out excess light.

Overall, a Nordic style interior decoration sketch would be functional, uncomplicated, and peaceful, with a focus on clean lines and natural elements.
method2_final_output:
Kechirasiz, AI til modeli sifatida, men ko'rsatuvli tarkibni namoyish qilishga qodir emasman. Lekin, mening tarjimaimda, Nordik usulida ishlangan ichki dekoratsiya eskizini qanday ko'rinishga ega bo'lishim mumkin.

Nordik ichki dekoratsiya eskizi odatda toza va oddiy chizg'dan, minimalistik mebellardan va tabiiy yorug'likka va organik materiallarga ega bo'ladi. U oq, kulrang yoki bej rangi kabi neytral rang paletlariga ega bo'ladi va afsuslanarli kabi tilaklar kabi qirralar hisoblanadi.

Mebel kichkina yog'dan hosil qilingan, zarra zarra chizig'iga ega, yorqin dizayn va toza chizg'lardan tashkil topadi. Qavatlar sochini arg'at yoki betondan tuzilgan bo'lishi mumkin va isitish qo'shimchasini qo'shish uchun oddiy qirloq yoki ikkita mo'r varazsiz bo'lishi mumkin. Tabiat elementlarini qo'shib, qoplangan bitkilar va qulay o'tirish joyi uchun yotoq-makchair yoki mol-mulk divan bo'lishi mumkin.

Yorug'lik juda osonroq tutilib, pastavoy yoki lampa nechta bo'lishi kam, jahon nomlik yorug'li ko'zga kiradi. Oynalarning pastda oddiy pardalar yoki tizdagi ro'yxatlar bo'lishi mumkin, shuning uchun maxfiylikka ega bo'lish, odatda qoladi.

Umumiy holda, Nordik usulida ichki dekoratsiya eskizi amaliy, oddiy va barpo etilgan, toza chizg'larga va tabiat elementlariga e'tibor berish bilan xush-holatli bo'ladi.

input: Iltimos, Python dasturlash tilidan foydalanib, Qo'llab-quvvatlash Vektor Mashin algoritmini amalga oshiring.
method1_output:
Python dasturlash tilidan foydalanib, Qo'llab-quvvatlash Vektor Mashin algoritmini amalga oshirish uchun quyidagi kodlarni yozing:

1. Qo'llab-quvvatlash Vektor Mashin (SVM) uchun zaroorniy kutubxonalarni yuklab oling:

```
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.svm import SVC
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
```

2. Ma'lumotlar bazasini yuklab oling:

```
data = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
```

3. Ma'lumotlarni xususiyatlari va maqsadlaridan ajratib olamiz:

```
X = data.drop('label', axis=1).values
y = data['label'].values
```

4. O'rganish va sinov uchun ma'lumotlarni bo'lib biriktirib olamiz:

```
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.2)
```

5. SVM algoritmini amalga oshiramiz:

```
svm = SVC(kernel='linear')
svm.fit(X_train, y_train)
```

6. Natijalarni baholaymiz:

```
y_pred = svm.predict(X_test)
accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
print("Accuracy:", accuracy)
```

Ushbu kodlar yordamida SVM algoritmi tanlab, u yordamida ma'lumotlar asosida sinov tuzish mumkin.
****************English Meaning****************
Using the Python programming language, write the following code to implement the Support Vector Machine algorithm: 

1. Load the necessary libraries for Support Vector Machine (SVM): 

```
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.svm import SVC
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
```

2. Load the dataset: 

```
data = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
```

3. Divide the data into attributes and labels: 

```
X = data.drop('label', axis=1).values
y = data['label'].values
```

4. Split data into training and testing sets: 

```
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.2)
```

5. Implement the SVM algorithm: 

```
svm = SVC(kernel='linear')
svm.fit(X_train, y_train)
```

6. Evaluate the results: 

```
y_pred = svm.predict(X_test)
accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
print("Accuracy:", accuracy)
```

With this code, the SVM algorithm can be selected and tested based on data.
method2_step1_output: Please use Python programming language to implement Support Vector Machine algorithm.
method2_step2_output:
Sure, here is a sample implementation of the Support Vector Machine algorithm in Python using the scikit-learn library:

```
from sklearn import svm

# Create a Support Vector Machine classifier with a linear kernel
svm_classifier = svm.SVC(kernel='linear')

# Train the classifier on the training data
svm_classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions on the test data
y_pred = svm_classifier.predict(X_test)

# Evaluate the performance of the classifier using evaluation metrics
accuracy = svm_classifier.score(X_test, y_test)
precision = precision_score(y_test, y_pred)
recall = recall_score(y_test, y_pred)
f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred)
```

In this example, `X_train` and `y_train` represent the training data and labels, respectively, and `X_test` and `y_test` represent the test data and labels, respectively. The `svm.SVC` class is used to create an SVM classifier with a linear kernel, and the `fit` method is used to train the classifier on the training data. Finally, the `predict` method is used to make predictions on the test data, and evaluation metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, and F1 score are calculated using functions from the scikit-learn library.
method2_final_output:
Albatta, Python tilida Support Vector Machine algoritmini amalga oshirish uchun scikit-learn kutubxonasidan foydalanib namunaviy implementatsiyani ko'rishingiz mumkin:

```
from sklearn import svm

# Linear kernel bilan Support Vector Machine classifier yaratish
svm_classifier = svm.SVC(kernel='linear')

# Kichiklashtirilgan ma'lumotlar bo'yicha sinflandiruvchini o'rganish
svm_classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Test ma'lumotlarida taxminlarni aniqlash
y_pred = svm_classifier.predict(X_test)

# Baholash tiplaridan foydalanib sinflandiruvchining ishonchliligini baholash
accuracy = svm_classifier.score(X_test, y_test)
precision = precision_score(y_test, y_pred)
recall = recall_score(y_test, y_pred)
f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred)
```

Ushbu misolda, `X_train` va `y_train` moslamalarining ustida o'rganishlar kiritilgan, shuningdek, `X_test` va `y_test` test ma'lumotlarni va belgilarni ifodalaydi. `svm.SVC` klassi linear kernel bilan SVM sinflandiruvchi yaratish uchun ishlatiladi va `fit` usuli sinflandiruvchini o'rganish uchun ishlatiladi. Oxirgi qadamda, `predict` usuli test ma'lumotlari bo'yicha taxminlarni aniqlash uchun foydalaniladi, va scikit-learn kutubxonasidan funksiyalar yordamida aniqlash natijalari, masalan, aniqlik, aniqlilik, tiklash va F1-qiymati hisoblanadi.

input: Quyidagi mazmuni asosida sarlavha yaratib boring: CBA plyoffchalarida "Salbiy o'yin" uchun ikki jamoa va murabbiylarga jazo berildi. 17-aprelda Xitoy Basketbol Assotsiatsiyasi media matbuot bilan muloqot o'tkazdi va Shaqhai Jushilong Lions va Suzhou Kenitex basketbol jamoalari o'rtasida o'tkazilgan ikki kritik o'yinda "salbiy o'yin" uchun g'alabaga qarshi amalga oshirilgan jazolar e'lon qilindi. Natijada, CBA o'yin uchun ishchi guruhlarning reytingini va qatnashishlarini bekor qildi va liga mablag'larini 5 million yuanga kamaytirdi. Respektiv jamoalar murabbiylari ham jazo bilan yuzlashtilar: Shanghay Jushilong va Suzhou Kenitex murabbiylari Li Chunjiang va Li Nan qosh nazorat litsenziyalari 5 yil va 3 yil davomida yo'q qilindi. Shilinjie, Kenitexning bosh menejeri va Jiang Yusheng, Jushilongning bosh menejeri ham 5 va 3 yil davomida ishdan uzoq qoldirilganlar. Asosiy jadvalga ko'ra bul. sezon CBA plyoffchalarining ikkinchi ratibi Shenzhen Marco Polo va Shanghai Jushilong o'rtasida o'tkazilish majmuasidan so'ng kun boshlanishi kerak edi. Lekin, taqiqlash sababli, Shenzhen Marco Polo yarim finalga otomatik ravishda chiqdi. CBA CEOsi Zhang Xiong jazolarining liqasiy qoidalariga muvofiq bo'lib, xato hajmini va aniqligiga qarab tasdiqlandi. CBA xudosi Yao Ming jazoga uzilarini ifodalanib sportda song'ni talab qilishni himoya qilgan. U umidi bilan aytadi, agar liga bu holatni xayrla o'tkaza oladi, uni o'zgarishlariga qaratish mumkin.
method1_output:
CBA Plyoffchalarida "Salbiy O'yin" Uchun Ikki Jamoa va Murabbiylarga Jazo Berildi
****************English Meaning****************
"Negative Game" Punishment Given to Two Teams and Their Coaches in CBA Playoffs
method2_step1_output: Create a title based on the following content: Two Teams and Coaches Given Punishment for "Negative Play" in CBA Playoffs. On April 17th, the Chinese Basketball Association held a media conference and announced penalties for two teams and coaches involved in two critical games for "negative play" between the Shanghai Jushilong Lions and Suzhou Kenitex basketball teams. As a result, the CBA revoked the ratings and participation of working groups for the game and lost 5 million yuan in league gains. The coaches of Jushilong and Kenitex, Li Chunjiang and Li Nan, respectively, were also banned from 5-year and 3-year supervision licenses. Shilinjie, the chief manager of Kenitex, and Jiang Yusheng, the head of Jushilong, were also removed from their positions for the same duration. The playoffs of the CBA season should have started on the day after the meeting between Shenzhen Marco Polo and Shanghai Jushilong, but due to the penalties issued, Shenzhen Marco Polo automatically advanced to the semi-finals. CBA CEO Zhang Xiong confirmed that their penalties were in line with their safety regulations and approved them based on their accuracy and clarity. CBA President Yao Ming hopes that these actions will protect sportsmanship in the game and has high expectations for the future. The league can make changes if it can handle the situation appropriately.
method2_step2_output: "Negative Play" in CBA Playoffs Results in Punishment for Two Teams and Coaches
method2_final_output: CBA O'yinlari "Salbiy o'yin" ikkita jamo va menejer uchun jazo bilan natija berdi.
